name: Bret Recor
biography: A graduate of Pratt Institute, where he was also an instructor, industrial designer Bret Recor later joined Yves Béhar’s firm fuseproject based in San Francisco. At fuseproject he was a design director on a number of projects, from commercial products to government and philanthropic initiatives, including One Laptop Per Child. He is currently a principal in the design firm Boxclever.
